name: 林群哲
objective:
本課程結合有機、紡織、化工等相關領域，邀請業師命題目前業界遇到之瓶頸，由授課教師帶領學生進行分組討論，目的在培養學生解決問題與論文期刊選讀之能力，每組學生必須針對專一之問題尋找最近相關的資料。業師命題，由授課老師協助學生資料之準備及練習口頭報告。且一學期至少須報告 1 次，與期末海報成果展，學期成績將以學生在課堂上參與的態度、報告資料及海報成果展決定。
Organic chemistry, textile, chemical engineering and other related fields are combined in the course. The invited industrial teachers propose the issues which encountered currently in the industry. Then, the teacher leads the students to conduct group discussions. The purpose is to cultivate students' ability to solve problems and read papers and periodicals. The invited industrial teachers provide questions. The teacher will assist student in the preparation of materials and practice oral reports. In addition, at least one report is required during a semester, and the final poster achievement exhibition. The scores will be determined based on the attitude of the students to participate in the classroom, the report materials and the poster achievement exhibition.
scorePolicy:
文獻報告 (40%)
口頭報告 (30%)
提問與回答 (20%)
出席 (10%)
materials:
(1) 業師提供課程講義與相關書籍
(2) 期刊文獻
remarks:
本學期原則採實體授課方式； 因應疫情警戒標準，本學期教學及授課方式請依照學校網頁所公布之訊息為準： (https://oaa.ntut.edu.tw/p/404-1008-98622.php?Lang=zh-tw)
(1) 利用 teams 線上教學，並將教學錄影連結公布北科 i 學園，以利學生觀課 (2) 利用北科 i 學園公布課程相關訊息 (3) 在符合防疫規範的前提下，保留學生須到校進行實體測驗的可能
